detectors.description:
ERC20._transfer(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ZapperFiToken.sol#61-68) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- _balances[sender] = _balances[sender].sub(amount,ERC20: transfer amount exceeds balance) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ZapperFiToken.sol#65)
	- _balances[recipient] = _balances[recipient].add(amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ZapperFiToken.sol#66)
